title: The Big mill
creator_credit: Templar Film Studios, Jack Holmes and Laurence Henson
brief_description: The Big Mill is a steel strip mill at Motherwell, outside Glasgow. The film follows the processes of making, testing and rolling hot steel slabs and sheeting, destined for use in every branch of modern life.
creator_credit_for_label: Templar Film Studios, Jack Holmes and Laurence Henson
